title:
Mathematical Exploration of the Intersection Between Extended
  Schrodinger-Virasoro Lie Algebras and Symplectic Novikov Lie Algebras
abstract:
This paper presents an in-depth mathematical investigation into the
intersection of two advanced Lie algebraic structures: the extended
Schr\"odinger-Virasoro Lie algebra (ESVLA) and the Symplectic Novikov Lie
algebra (SNLA). By rigorously analyzing their derivations, central extensions,
and automorphism groups, we seek to uncover potential synergies and
applications linking these distinct algebraic frameworks. The exploration
includes detailed proofs, derivations, and calculations, providing new insights
into the representation theory of Lie algebras with potential applications in
conformal field theory and symplectic geometry.
